skills.name: Read the graphical solution to a pair of linear simultaneous equations from a diagram

explanations.A: One solution means that the two lines would have to cross at one point. These lines are parallel so will they ever cross?
explanations.B: Two straight lines could only cross at one point at the most, otherwise they would not be straight lines. These lines are parallel though. What does that tell us about the number of times they will cross?
explanations.C: As the lines are parallel, they will never cross so there are no solutions.
explanations.D: Infinitely many solutions would mean that the lines are identical. They would be the same line. These lines are not identical, but they are parallel. What does that tell us?
